column2: We are negotiating a political solution to our problems.
The Jizya taxes are an age-old discriminatory system of taxation of non-Muslims.
Our long occupation of a country that has already been defeated is drawing international criticism.
We have reformed our nation to the extent that we are fully democratic.

The Ryotwari system was a land revenue system in British India, introduced by Thomas Munro in 1820 based on system administered by Captain Alexander Read in the Baramahal District. It allowed the government to deal directly with the cultivator ('ryot') for revenue collection and gave the peasant freedom to cede or acquire new land for cultivation. The peasant was assessed for only the lands that he cultivated.
Our country social reforms match every socialist demand, having some scholars call us an welfare state.
Whether for defense or for conquest, the call to arms echoes throughout our nation, rallying the military, and indeed the people, to serve the motherland.
The Pashtunwali code, by which Pashtuns abide, gives our nation strength during the most trying of times!
The Congress of $COUNTRY$ shall make no law respecting an establishment of religion, or prohibiting the free exercise thereof.

State atheism is a major goal of the official $COUNTRY_ADJ$ ideology, which seeks the elimination of all existing religions and the prevention of the future implanting of religious beliefs by all means necessary.
Our country has recently called upon all her allies to join our ongoing wars.
Fort William, located in Calcutta, acts as the seat of the Bengal Presidency.

A French term used for a policy of mass national conscription, often in the face of invasion. The concept originated during the French Revolutionary Wars where it formed an integral part of the creation of national identity, making it distinct from forms of conscription which had existed before this date.
By pre-planning mobilization, all reserve units had set mobilization areas and time tables for getting equipment, boarding trains, and frontal marching routes. This sped up the mobilization vastly.

These tables categorized tasks, position, etc. so that it was easy in peace time to place personnel into combat formations. During mobilization the process was sped up as it was easy to know which soldier was to go to what company.
The introduction of working staffs at lower echelon units was a spin off from having an effective and functional General Staff. Soon all units had staffs that supported their leaders.
At this point specialists formed certain groups that serviced specialized railroad units. These could quickly load and reload trains and service the full movement of army units.
A communist or fascist government flag has been set that allows closed border and totalitarian reforms to be enacted.
Communist or fascist government flag has been cleared.

This tech allows you to enact universal healthcare.

Yong Ying were a type of regional army that emerged in the 19th century in the Qing dynasty army, which fought in most of China's wars after numerous rebellions exposed the ineffectiveness of the regular Qing armies. The new rule "Soldiers followed the general, soldiers belonged to the general", led to decentralization of power and a rise of regional warlords within China.
This is a modifier for AI to prevent them from adding additional wargoals to a scripted war. If you have this modifier as a player, this is a bug and should be reported.
